resources.string: No links found for this configuration, tap the \" + \" button to add one.
Chiedi al tuo fisioterapista di aggiungere il tuo account
Per l\'azione cliccata non è stato ancora inserito un video
From here you can access your actions and add new ones tapping on the green + button at the bottom
Sei sicuro di voler eliminare l\'azione?
Uno o più campi sono vuoti, per salvare l\'azione è necessario compilare tutti i campi in maniera corretta
Non puoi creare una nuova azione senza prima inserire un video.
Esiste già un\'azione con lo stesso nome
Esiste già un video, sei sicuro di volerlo cambiare?

Il campo indica la durata minima, in secondi, dell\'azione per essere riconosciuta dal sistema. Questo implica che l\'azione deve essere eseguita in un tempo maggiore rispetto ai secondi minimi, altrimenti non viene riconosciuta.

Il campo indica la durata massima, in secondi, dell\'azione per essere riconosciuta dal sistema. Questo implica che l\'azione deve essere eseguita in un tempo minore rispetto ai secondi massimi, altrimenti non viene riconosciuta.

Non è possibile riconoscere tutti i punti del corpo dal video inserito, se è necessario riconoscere tutte le parti del corpo eseguire un nuovo video in cui sono visibili tutte le parti del corpo in modo più chiaro.
È Necessario Attivare il Servizio di Accessibilità
Per poter provare l\'azione è necessario attivare l\'accessibility service dalle impostazioni del dispositivo
Confermando invierai al server l\'azione e non sarà più possibile cancellarla ma solamente modificarla
La durata minima inserita è superiore alla durata massima, inserire dei valori corretti prima di procedere al salvataggio dell\'azione
Il riconoscimento dell\'azione potrebbe non essere preciso.\nSi consiglia di registrare nuovamente il video o ritagliare quello attuale.
Non è presente nessun video per questa azione.\nSe vuoi utilizzare questa azione registra un nuovo video.
Non sono ancora presenti configurazioni per questo gioco
Il gioco selezionato non è installato. Se vuoi giocare a questo gioco scaricalo dal Play Store.
È Necessario Attivare il Servizio di Accessibilità
Per poter provare l\'azione è necessario attivare l\'accessibility service dalle impostazioni del dispositivo
Non è possibile utilizzare la seguente configurazione perchè una o più azioni non sono state configurate
Non sono ancora presenti eventi per questa configurazione
Non hai inserito il nome per la configurazione
Non hai inserito la lista degli eventi, per proseguire inserire almeno un evento.
Esiste già una configurazione con lo stesso nome
Vuoi Davvero creare la configurazione? Una volta creata non sarà più possibile modificarla
È Necessario Attivare il Servizio di Accessibilità
Per poter provare l\'azione è necessario attivare l\'accessibility service dalle impostazioni del dispositivo
Premi OK, per confermare la rimozione dell\'evento indicato.\nAnnulla altrimenti
L\'azione %s non è stata configurata, se vuoi procedere alla configurazioni premi sul pulsante "Vai al configuratore azioni".
Tocca l\'immagine per aggiungere dove eseguire l\'evento
Inserisci lo screenshot del gioco che hai appena selezionato premendo l\'immagine sottostante per aggiungerlo a PlayAccess.
Are you sure you want to close the app?
Deleting \"%1$s\" may require retraining the vocal recognition if the action this recording is part of is used in a configuration
Deleting \"%1$s\" will also delete the events associated with this screen.
For each game you can define a series of configurations.
Each configuration has a series of events and screens that you can define by tapping on it.
Color circles represent the events defined in a screen
In this state tap the button to start vocal recognition training
We are training the vocal recognition system to recognize your voice
This will allow you to use vocal commands in the game you have configured
Deleting \"%1$s\" will also delete the configurations associated with it.
Deleting \"%1$s\" will delete all files associated with it, some configurations might use this action.
Deleting \"%1$s\" will remove all events and screens associated with it.
Are you sure you want to delete the event \"%1$s\"?
Event \"%1$s\" cannot be saved (maybe an event with the same name already exists for this game).\nPlease change the event name and try again.
PlayAccess cannot work properly without permissions.\nAre you sure you don\'t want to grant them?
This name is already used in another configuration of this game!
Error saving screenshot, check that image and name are not already used in another screenshot
There seems to be no actions available, go to the Actions section and add one
Select an action to use in this event
Select the type of event you want to do
The recording is about to begin..
Connect the external device to the smartphone via bluetooth
Tap on the image alongside to insert one screenshot
Tap on the image above to insert one screenshot
Select an event to view it.
Open the game and take a screenshot on the screen you want to play.
To add an event you must first enter a screenshot.
Tap on \"Add event\" to add an event to this screen
Select a screen to view its details
You haven\'t entered any screen for this configuration.
Select a configuration to view its details
You haven\'t entered any configuration for this game yet
Tap the image to add where to run the event.
Tap the image to edit where to run the event.
You have not selected a point to hold the event
Remember that the vocal recognition system works better with two recordings
Name the action then tap \"Add vocal\"
Make sure you are in a quiet place
Produce a simple and continuous sound for 5 seconds
When you\'re ready, tap \" REC \" to start recording \n(Will be automatically stopped after 5 seconds)
Tap \" STOP \" to end the recording
Name the action then tap \"Add button\"
When you are ready press the button of the external device you want to set.
No button was tap in the external connected device
This button is already saved in an action
Details on the stored external button
The app that allows you to configure your favorite games with customized commands according to your needs
In order to store your custom configurations we need permission to access:
Microphone \nto record your voice for vocal commands
First of all let\'s add an action to PlayAccess
Select the type of action you want to add
Name the Action then tap on the button \"Add vocal\"
Pronounce a vowel for about 5 seconds. \n\nPress the \"REC\" button to start recording the vocal command
Produce the same sound as before. \n\nPress the \"REC\" button to start recording the vocal command
Press the \"STOP\" button to end recording the vocal command
Now let\'s do another same recording so the vocal recognition system will work better
Great ! \nWe\'ve registered the vocal command, now let\'s go back to the main menu
Name the Action then tap on the button \"Add button\"
Now you will be asked to turn on Bluetooth to connect the external device
Now press the button of the external device you want to set
Now let\'s go to the section Games
Let\'s add a game to PlayAccess
Tap on the configuration to set it
Let\'s add a screen to the configuration

Tap to add a screenshot from Gallery 
(If you haven't a screenshot of the game running, go do it then come back here)
Save the screen and go on
Complete the fields then tap the \"Save\" button
\nWe are almost there ! \nWe\'ve defined the event, we just have to train the system for vocal recognition
You have entered a button action so there is no need to train the vocal recognition system, tap here to end the tutorial
Now you just have to play.
Remember to activate the PlayAccess service in the accessibility settings before playing

Tap the switch in the top right to enable the PlayAccess accessibility service. 

By enabling this accessibility service you will be able to play your favorite games using the commands defined in the PlayAccess app. 

This service accesses bluetooth and camera only if you are playing a game with facial expressions or external buttons commands configured in the specific configuration app. For this reason the service accesses device's storage only to take the informations about configurations you have set for your games.
Open a configured game to use it with PlayAccess
Looks like you forgot to train vocal recognition\'s system.\n To play with the custom setup, make the train on PlayAccess.
The PlayAccess accessibility service needs access to:
Microphone We access device\'s microphone only when you\'re playing with vocal commands
Storage\nWe access device\'s storage only to save/read the data you have set
The app needs read and write and record audio permissions to work correctly
Camera\nWe access device\'s camera only when you\'re playing with camera commands
Notifications (Optional)\nYou can use notification to interact with PlayAccess and edit its settings
Bluetooth\nWe access bluetooth only when you\'re playing with external buttons
The accessibility service needs permissions to work
The event cannot be added because it already exists
The event cannot be modified because it already exists
You haven\'t given the event a name
An event with the same name already exists
More actions and events, open PlayAccess for details
Show a graphical representation of the recognized actions
Show your face on screen (facial expression actions only)
Show recognized expression on screen (facial expression actions only)
Draw face landmarks on your face (facial expression actions only)
Balance facial expression recognition accuracy and input lag (facial expression actions only)
This configuration has no defined events
This configuration has one defined event
You have not entered any screenshot for this configuration, tap the \" + \" button to add one.
Select the screen where you want to define the link.
the file has been removed successfully
Warning! By deleting an audio file you will need to update the vocal models of all the configurations that used it
Button not saved, connect a bluetooth device and press a button
A button with the same code already exists
Insert the name of the action
An action with the same name already exists
You have entered a new configuration
Choose another name for the configuration
You can\'t use this app without giving permissions
You have not entered the name
You have not entered the event type
You have not entered an action
You have not entered a screenshot
If you select Long Tap - ON/OFF you have to declare two actions
Define a duration in seconds greater than 0
A green tick appears if the link is configured correctly
Here is a screenshot of the game you want to configure
the marker indicates where the action will be performed
You have entered a new game
the game you selected has already been entered
Insert the name of the configuration
red: you re not recording green: you are recording a new audio
this button allows you to listen to the audio
this button allows you to stop to the audio
this button allows you to delete to the audio
the configuration has been removed successfully

red: the game has not been configured
yellow: the game has been partially configured
green: the game has been configured correctly
Go to the action tab to record a new ambient sound
This section allows you to register a new external device button. To do this, connect your device to your smartphone via Bluetooth. When you re ready, press the Start button.
This section allows you to record a new voice command. To do this, make sure you are in a silent space. When you\'re ready, press the Start button.
Click the button of the external device you want to memorize.
No Action is present yet. Press + to add one
No games are present yet. Press \" + \" to add them
No events are present yet. Press + to add them
Touch the point on the screen where you want the action to take place
Warning! Deleting a game will also delete all its configurations
Warning! Pressing Delete will remove this configuration permanently
- Press "+" to add a new action
- Press on an existing action to modify or delete it
- Press "+" to add a new game
- Press on a game to add or change a configuration
- The colored ball next to the game indicates its configuration status (green = correctly configured, yellow = something to change, red = not configured)
- Press the "+" button to add a recording
- Press the "Delete action" button to delete all the files associated with it
Warning! If you decide to add a new recording you will have to try to repeat the sound that you have previously saved, not a new one!
- Press the "+" button to add a configuration
- Press on the circle next to the name of the configuration to make it active
- Press on the name of the configuration to view its details
- Press the "Trash" button to delete this configuration
- Press the "+" button to add a new event

- When you add a vocal action to the configuration the vocal training button will appear (red: com.example.configuratore_eazioni.it.unimi.di.ewlab.iss.playaccess.configuratoreazioni.model to train, green: working com.example.configuratore_eazioni.it.unimi.di.ewlab.iss.playaccess.configuratoreazioni.model detected)
Hello and welcome to Acube! With PlayAccess you can create shortcuts to quickly access your preferred apps Let s get started!

A shortcut is a quick way to fire an *event* in app (e.g., tap on a point) with a personaized *action*. There are two types of actions that you can define: button on external controller or audio instructions. This app let you configure the shortcuts for your apps.

Before running this setup remember to turn the PlayAccess accessibility service off. When you finish configuring, you can turn the PlayAccess accessibility service on again. If you have not yet installed the PlayAccess accessibility service, continue here to download.
Here you can see the events you have configured To create a shortcut that works correctly for each event, an action must be correlated
Here you can choose where the event will be activated.You need a screenshot of the game.

Choose a simple sound that you can easily reproduce. Repeat the chosen sound in different ways for about ten seconds. Remember that you can replay, delete or add new recordings from the Actions tab. Here you can listen to an audio example
Check that you have a connected Bluetooth device. If at the touch of a button the codes "Device" and "Button" are updated, the app is detecting them correctly.

Green: the voice com.example.configuratore_eazioni.it.unimi.di.ewlab.iss.playaccess.configuratoreazioni.model was successfully initialized Red: you must initialize the vocal com.example.configuratore_eazioni.it.unimi.di.ewlab.iss.playaccess.configuratoreazioni.model to make this link work
To use voice commands, you must record an audio with the sound of the environment in which you intend to use the app.
Device\'s camera is recording in background to detect user video actions.
Deleting this body pose will remove all the actions, events and screen associated with it.

•Define a pose or use a built-in one.
 •Define an action as a sequence of poses.
 •Remember, to create a pose you need 5 photos of the whole body depicting the pose.
 •An action must have at least two poses.
You must specify a name without whitespaces
Use the Action Configurator to record the movements you can perform
Link your actions to your games with the Game Configurator
Welcome to PlayAccess,\nthe application that makes yout favorite games more accessible
To continue, enable the PlayAccess accessibility service from the options
